src:
連毛巾都沒遮　王柏傑對著范曉萱正面全裸
04 Nov 2019, 09:47 by 娛樂組
Netflix首部華語原創影集《罪夢者》正式上線後，引發觀眾迴響熱烈，原本期待的張孝全與賈靜雯的俊男美女組合，居然一下從天堂掉進地獄，出乎讓觀眾意料，另外一組王柏傑與范曉萱的關係也相當戲劇化。因為王柏傑對著范曉萱正面全裸，連毛巾都沒遮，真的太敬業了。
其實在正式上線兩個月前，在陶晶瑩主持的訪談中，就隱約透露了王柏傑正面全裸對著范曉萱的劇情。當時王柏傑在不透露劇情的前提下，表示有全裸的演出，結果被追問「有毛巾遮嗎？」「沒有！」等到《罪夢者》正式上線後，觀眾都拚命檢查，到底這場全裸沒毛巾遮的戲在哪裡。
其實這場戲是呼應王柏傑與范曉萱在戲裡首度相遇時，人在白雪大舞廳，從後方環抱范曉萱緊貼跳舞。等到逃出監獄後，王柏傑、章立衡、周洺甫三人趁著大熱天，脫光洗澡，結果范曉萱在此時出現了，於是眾人紛紛閃避，留下王柏傑正面全裸對著范曉萱。由於王柏傑在全劇身材大放送，連關在監獄裡都脫上衣尬張孝全，瞬間成為觀眾心目中的精壯鮮肉。


張孝全（左）與賈靜雯（中）成為有緣無份的愛侶，只是當他們好不容易重逢，卻多了一個郭子乾（右），到底這是什麼關係？！（Netflix提供）

另外一條戲劇支線，則是張孝全與賈靜雯這對青梅竹馬，卻因為一樁意外，讓兩人有緣無分、相隔一道監獄鐵窗。加上賈靜雯劇中無人陪產，只能獨自生下小孩，連她都覺得劇中人靜芳應該從這瞬間，從愛意轉變成絕望、甚至帶有恨意。
然而更叫觀眾拍案叫絕的是，在分隔十年後，當初逮捕張孝全的警察郭子乾，居然成了賈靜雯的「好友」，還頻繁出入她家。甚至當張孝全歷經重重障礙，與賈靜雯重逢時，郭子乾也出現了，這讓觀眾忍不住猜測，難道賈靜雯後來跟郭哥在一起嗎？！各種揣測理論滿天飛，呼籲大家最好一口氣追完《罪夢者》，才不會被爆雷！




★《鏡週刊》關心您：抽菸有害身心健康。

更新時間｜2019.11.04 09:46
text:
Even the towels are not covered. Wang Baijie is facing the face of Fan Xiaolan.
04 Nov 2019, 09:47 by Entertainment Group
Netflix's first Chinese original album "Sin Dreamer" was officially launched, which triggered the audience to respond enthusiastically. The original expected combination of Zhang Xiaoquan and Jia Jingwen's handsome men and women, actually fell from heaven to hell, unexpectedly surprised the audience, another group of Wang Baijie and Fan Xiaotong The relationship is also quite dramatic. Because Wang Baijie was completely naked to Fan Xiaolan, and even the towels were not covered, it was really dedication.
In fact, two months before the official launch, in the interview hosted by Tao Jingying, it was vaguely revealed that Wang Bojie’s face was completely naked against Fan Xiaolan’s story. At that time, Wang Bojie said that he had a naked performance on the premise of not revealing the plot. The result was asked "Is there a towel?" "No!" After the "Sinner" was officially launched, the audience was desperately inspected. Where is the towel covering?
In fact, this scene is echoed when Wang Baijie and Fan Xiaolan met for the first time in the play. People were dancing in the snow-white dance hall and embracing Fan Xiaolan from the rear. After escaping from the prison, Wang Baijie, Zhang Liheng, and Zhou Wei took a big hot day and took off their bath. As a result, Fan Xiaoyu appeared at this time, so everyone shoveled, leaving Wang Baijie to face the full face naked Fan Xiaolan. As Wang Bojie was released in the whole drama, he even took off his clothes in the prison, Zhang Xiaoquan, and instantly became the elite of the audience.


Zhang Xiaoquan (left) and Jia Jingwen (middle) became lovers who had no relationship, but when they finally reunited, they added a Guo Ziqian (right). What is the relationship? ! (provided by Netflix)

Another drama branch line is Zhang Xiaoquan and Jia Jingwen, who are a childhood friend, but because of an accident, they have a relationship without a point, separated by a prison window. In addition, Jia Jingwen's play is unaccompanied, and she can only give birth to a child alone. Even she feels that the person Jing Jingfang should change from love to despair and even hate from this moment.
However, it is even more sensational for the audience. After ten years of separation, Guo Zigan, the policeman who arrested Zhang Xiaoquan, became a "friend" of Jia Jingwen and frequently went to and from her home. Even when Zhang Xiaoquan experienced many obstacles and reunited with Jia Jingwen, Guo Zigan also appeared. This made the audience unable to guess. Is Jia Jingwen later with Guo Ge? ! All kinds of speculation theory is flying all over the sky, calling on everyone to chase after the "Sin Dreamer" in one breath, so that they will not be thundered!




★ "Mirror Weekly" cares about you: smoking is harmful to your health.

Update time|2019.11.04 09:46
